EmailTemplate.name: 01_2014 Virtual VMUG Follow Up.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Virtual VMUG Follow Up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}}, Thanks for taking the time to stop by and chat with us at the Virtual VMUG User Group online event. As a follow-up to the event, we've linked below a few of the many resources designed to dive deeper into the ways VMTurbo will dramatically improve how you control and automate your virtual data center.
- Trial Download <http://bit.ly/1doILvj> check out VMTurbo in your environment, absolutely free - Whitepaper <http://bit.ly/Kylm3B> on optimizing workload configurations in your virtual environment
We will be following up with you shortly to understand your priorities and interest in learning more about VMTurbo.
Sincerely, VMTurbo
